name: The Adventurers Of The Universe
description:
The year is 2050.

Humans have found different planets in our solar system. Traveling to new planets and finding rare oil resources has become a new trade.

You are a freelancer commissioned by the senate on the planet Earth. You've gathered 3 gallons of oil, but the senate wants more. They ask you to visit a small nearby planet called 'Bruno'. And your journey begins ...

People of Platonia have been talking about a distant purple planet. The speciality of this planet is, it turns black as you try to go nearby. Nobody has every landed on that planet. You decide to take it on as your mission. What horrors will you find there? Or will you find the glory that you long hoped for?
